Class SHH

java.lang.Object
SHH
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observer
public class SHH
extends java.lang.Object
implements Observer
SHH observer class that manages the SHH tab in the SmartHomeDashboard and updates the HVAC

      rooms - list of all rooms in the house
      shd - the smart home dashboard object
      outsideTemp - the temperature of the desired home temperature
